cognitoConfig.emailVerificationMessage:
Verification code: {####}

We have received a request to reset your password for your account with [Company/Organization Name]. To ensure the security of your account, we are providing you with a unique password reset code.

Please use the following code to reset your password: {####}.

If you did not initiate this password reset request, please disregard this email. Your account is still secure, and no action is required on your part.

If you require any assistance or have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact our support team at [Support Email or Phone Number]. We are here to help you.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Best regards,

Summize Team
